vulnerability.name: USN-4124-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4124-1 fixed a vulnerability in Exim. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Exim incorrectly handled certain decoding  operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute  arbitrary commands.

statements.status_notes: Exim could be made to run programs as an administrator if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
